Blog.post: yoyo boy come here and post liao~! xiang wo bazx? lolx.. nothing much happen recently lorz..so sian de everday..eh...talk about yesterday bazx..yesterday 8 am jui go yew hong hse and play BB le..training lai de..i learn much from yew hong siah..his bb skill is superb..his frd oso..shao jun dui bu dui?lolx.eh..both of them is from bb team de worzx..den play till about 12 something lorz..tired arz..ah ma n li lin come find us siah..they veri sian at home so ask them out lorz..after tt we go cp there eat eat..ask them go hougang complex dun want..li lin mother larz..so strict..by 3 pm need reach home..wad bull shit..lolx..den ah ma oso dun wanna go le..they wanna go serangoon buy straws de but i cannot pei them go arz..need to complex there play badminton ma..den at cp eat hao liao jui go separate ways lorz..we head for complex..ah ma li lin at there shop shop..we saw lionel oxy at cp there lehz..wad a coincidence..reach there stupid de...got soccer competition..den half of the court taken liao..all courts book..hai us need to play in the middle..but not bad larz..quite fun de..keep tag wif yew lorz..michael n oxy tt team super strong siah..no one win them..LOL..pro realli pro lehx..den wo n yew 4 o clock jui go home le..den at night whole day rot at home lorz..today lehx?rot at home till 3 something..go grandmother hse there side-punggol..eat hao le jui go tt competition lorz..we win semi-final siah..score is 5 to 1.. got 2 siah!so shuang...lolx..after tt celebrate my aunt birthday..so borin de larz..after tt jui go home lorz..today still sing duan liao de xuan to ah ma and wei yan..so pai sei..LOL..but at last hear ah ma sing le..not bad worzx..hehezx..can imporve lorz..but is gd liao le...hao larz.. i stop here le..hehezx..{sIaN bOy}

hey ya!! sian bOY wo LAI post le..damn idiot lar..so long nvr post le...all b cuz of stupid ca test..hai wo keep study study no time to post..eh..very sucky lorz..all the test i dun have confidence de lehz...tml still got chem and SS..omg..stupid arz...but one thing i very very de happy!!!happen at tml de!her parents allow me and her to be together le!!!they xiang tong le!!!they sae even let her go overseas she oso may not be happy de ma..she had been crying for these few days..her frds told wo de..haix..y she so silly?cry for me..haix...but nvrm at last mircale happen le..hahaxz...mostly i think is b cuz i got accomplished the mission bazx..my effort not wasted siah...dunnno wad to sae larz..i juz very very de kai xin..nan yi yong zi lai xing rong..now we 2 officially can be zai yi qi le..nth troubles me any more..WaHaHahAhA~! LOL...i siao liao..actually bewteen those time when the problem not solved tt time i veri luan...wish to give up de..hehezx..LucKy got sissy de support! Li lin,wei yan and ah ma give me a lot of advice lorz..realli must hao hao de sae xie xie to u all lehz..haha..if not them maybe the mission may fail bazx..hao le lar..sae about today bazx..stupid de lehz the e.maths test..my circle thingy most lan de..den a lot do wrong..siah lar..dunno will fail or not..den horx..the shen tong!!li lin i mean...omg she get the circle with a square the qns correct..siaH laH!!normally see her so lazy and gong gong de..she know how to do!!omg...unbelieveable..but i get it wrong lorz..hahazx...my e.amaths realli sux sei..cannot tahan..hear tt jiao sure fail..he anyhow do..lolx..somemore will be 1 digit marks bazx..hao le nth to sae le..

today nth much happen..still the same lorz..morning go sch attend the physic remedial..actually dun wanna go de..cuz me got things to settle ma..but ah ma,li lin and wei yan si also dun allow me to go..i bo bian lorz..must ting hua..lolx..talk about the remedial bazx..still ok larz..miss oh give us sheets of papaers..its summary of all the chapter tt will be tested..and still got revise on some calculation question like the heat capacity lorz..those qns some so chim n complicated de..heng got listen ar or later dunno den die le..quite a number of ppl got come for it lorz..got chong wee they all and some from 3E de..den after the remedial yew n me play soccer for a while in class cuz so sian ma..still need to teach elieen a.maths on logarithm..she siao de..suddenly so hardworking..after jui go plaza eat eat..ting suo sissy they all go cp after remedial..wy neber go..cuz she got piano de mock test..so veri mocky larz..LOL..but veri sad lehz..she failed it..LOL..they veri fun like tt..go see baby the thingy..like all got family le..hope in the future sissy can find their mr right bazx..den after i eat le jui go home..study study study..stupid chinese larz..so sucky de..den i oso got do maths lorz..self revise..on the factor therom lorz..den at about 7 bazx..go grandmother hse to celebrate my cousin bday..so sian over there..got nth to do.. all i do is to eat! tin of biscuit,magee mee and fried rice! yum yum!! lolx..hao le me stop here..

wo yu lai post le worzx..today is friday the 13th~! unlucky day arz..indeed it is..leave tt for later..today after sch arz me oxy li lin wei yan ah ma all go kovan n play bowling..fun lehz..ah ma is first time play but li lin play b4 le..we take 2 lane 11 n 12..den four of us 1 lane den me n oxy use another lane too..sian ger nvr play cuz she working on something..ah ma first time play den she throw de way veri fuuny lehz...but cannot laugh at her worzx..first time ma~after tt she got improve lehz...still got strike arz! but is play for me de..li lin oso not bad lar..but she did something veri funny..she take the ball wif her 2 hand..den juz push and let it roll down the lane..zhen hao siao..den 2 of them so bad de..keep helping me n oxy to throw..getting so "HIGH" score.. lolx..but nvrm lar..juz as wad i said le.. hao peng you yi chang..mei guan xi..den li lin need to go home early ma..den sissy go liao lorz..left me n oxy playing.once they gone we 2 play well lehz..LOL..veri soury...not bad larz.. on form.. but oxy more siao..den when take mrt to cp tt time, saw ah ma n sian ger again..den reach cp le..i take lrt to plaza, someone pull my bag..xia dao! is ah ma n wei yan again..so qiao arz..anyway today veri happy lorz..have some memories to hui yi hui yi..i will not forget today de..today is bad friday..after tuition go home, saw miss call..is her parents called.. i was shocked..mind is blank after hearing tt the mission is nth liao..even i can achieve tt she oso need go overseas..i realli got nth to sae.. at tt moment i am too shocked to react n give an answer...all the hardwork is useless..her parents wun even think about it..gen bu yong say is appreciate..today is about tt le..
urlLink our class 3E~! it rox!! urlLink

sianxx...today nth much happen..at sch so sian de..all lesson so sucking..keep feeling tired oso..sit wif oxy or sian ger lorz..den tok tok..ahahzx..sian ger tired arz..keep sleeping at rahim period..rahim not bad lehz..got tell us tips for common test..make our job much more easier..lolx....den horz at maths lesson song bird teach us solving the cubice euqation thingy..teach till so luan tt a lot of ppl dun understand..haix..stupid man..erm den me n oxy do a function question like siao..keep cannot solved de..at last song bird help us lorz..den horz actually jiang hao le go bowling..but onli me n oxy go..too sian le ma..in the end go yc house..at there play cs lorz..den till 5 go RM kfc eat eat..met lionel n yew hong to play deck.. time is running out!! still go a few more days to date line le!! still need some more to accomplish tt misssion siah~! i must work hard arz..or she will be leaving..haix..dun have confidence arz..and these few days her parents restircted her to contact wif me again..missing her arz..ok larz.. tt is all about today le..

today sch reopen le~! at last not so sian le..got my frd ma..n sissy too! better to rot at home larz.. today one thing veri kao bei siah~! first day of sch den got the sucking SS test..idiot lar tt rahim..cannot tahan him..den horz get back english test n physic test..sian larz..disappointed wif my results..but e.maths still ok larz..acceptable lorz.. me and GOH "MEI FANG" play flour lorzx..den spray or put the flour on ah ma sian ger and li lin head..den tt li lin arz.. haix...put the flour on my neck siah...hai wo need to wash..today cai po po xing qing bu hao lehz..dunno is mood swings or wad larz.. menstruation izzit? hahazx.. fa wo men stand for one period.. siao de larz he.. after sch me sian ger n "MEI FABG" go cp eat eat.. sian ger larz ask me eat BK..still sae got cupon...in the end dun habe..den the fries sux like sh!t..burger still ok..after tt "MEI FANG" go home le.. me sian ger N oxy go serangoon lorz..like veri fun lyk tt.. walk tt aimlessly for 10 mins..den at last buy the straws lorz...pink n white..sian ger want de ma..den we go kovan play bowling..haha i ask sian ger to pei wo den she sae ok lorz..me n oxy play for 4 games..not bad larz..today bit bit on form..OXY pro worzx..den sian ger so sian..making her heart heart thingy..lolz.. den after tt take mrt back to cp..sian ger n OXY go home..me straight away go plaza.. must rush for tuition ma... today teach new chap..so fun lehz! all algebra de.. i love it.. after tt go home lorz.. that is all for today le larz..

yeah~! tml at last sch reopen!! wait for so long le! i rather go attend sch den rot at home arz.. cause at sch can tou lan ma.. most important got my bunch of frds! and sissy~! lol.. so long neber see them will miss them oso de larz.. but horz the worst part is got those sucky homework.. heng i got do chinese letter compo..Or sure will ger scolding from cai po po.. later being chase out of the class again den sian diao arz! but me neber bring A.maths text home cannot do a single hW arz~! wah lau sure get scolded by tt song bird de.. hao jiang jiang juz now the thingy.. me same as usual come back from tuition den straight away go bathe lorz..qi ji ah today! i pay my fullest attention to the teacher siah! first time lehz! quite interesting de today.. teach us a chim chim compre wif chim chim de summary..den horz veri happy for sian ger oso..her stead sae he gonna give up his entertainment and us more time to pei her le! good siah!he realise the importance of ger liao~!ger ger must be oso veri happy bax.. she n lin lin so yong gong! study SS siah.. me lehz? too lazy to touch it arx..tml de test sure fail wif flying colours de..hahax ah ma tell me cannot slp late..so i must be guai guai de ma..listen to her lorz..agree to log off wif her at 11 am.. fuuny promise rite? LOL!! hao le, jui jiang dao here.. sweet dreams all~!

haiyo..afternoon over liao siah..so fast de...sian lehz..the whole morning till now keep doin some bo liao thingy..keep listening to jay songs..going to sian diao liao..den find ppl in msn to chat lorz..sian ma..ah ma com siao one..reformat liao gone crazy arz..morning cant even swtich on..LOL..orBe..no lar jking..now her com yu hao le..one thing cannot tahan siah..tt li lin..omg...today her grandmother come her hse..den she go play mahjong..omg..she dun sian i oso sian si le..always keep playing mahjong..like veri fun like tt..hear tt today got soccer match at sch..elite versus dreamoz lehz..siah lamak! dreamoz is a beri gd team siah..but elite oso not tt bad larz..today oso neber contact her..haix..shi pai arz... sian 1/2...tonight still got stupid english tuition..wah lau..going to listen the teacher talking crap again...he give de work i oso dun do de ma..so bo liao de his lesson..always do wad compre..as if will imporve like tt..haix...lucky got my dear ccw to pei wo tok..or else will sian si de...hao le larz bu duo jiang le..

air pork larz..today wake up so early..dun feel like sleeping de..haizx..sian arz sian arz~! today oso rot at home lorz..no jie mu lehz..qi de zhao but ci de bu hao! go rivervale mall eat the burger king as breakfast.. er xin siah! the burger got zi ma on it and cabbage with sauce! so yucky..pui arz!oso bring my discman along lorz..cuz addicted to listenin to songs wherever i go de.. den horz go home lorz..stupid mother wan me to study lehz! wah lau oie...cant stand her..almost everyday need to read de..and veri idiotic arz! need to read geo, social,physic,chemistry all sorts of sh!T.. but shld noe me the bazx.. i so lazy..i juz stare blankly at those books den about 1 hour later tell my mother i read finish le.. LOL! she believe lehz..so gong de..ok larz sae about something else..jay 5th album rox siah!all songs nice nice de..those neber buy de faster go buy and ting ting..and it tu po yi bai wan zhang lehz.. qiang rite? his album not gai de worzx..got si li de!hahazx..ok larz..tt is all about morning le larz..

aiyoyozx..today go china town till veri late den come back arz..tire siah..go wif my relatives so sian..nothing to do..juz go gai gai..but got my favourite things which is food! i eat damn a lot siah..today realli siao arz..like eathing the whole street food..but wun full de..let me hui yi hui yi..hmm...got hua shen hu and zi ma hu!!omg so nice heavenly!!i eat more than 10 bowls arz..den horz go eat tou hua..not bad larz but too sweet le..a bit er xin..LOL! den got eat satay arz otah and a lot larz..den shop shop a while lorz..but me neber buy anything..they shop i keep listen so songs using disc man..den eat again..go to a veri dirty kopitiam there..haiyo so dirty tt i fan wei kou..but still got eat larz..the fried kuey tiao is so damn hot!den something realli interesting happen!she appear in front of me wif her parents..such coincidence!!omg zhen shi yo yuan arz!the first thing we do is to hug..neber care about her parents oso..we miss each other too much le..6 days lehz!den i immediately grab her hand and run away to a quiet place..we chat lorz..out of sudden she took the initiative to XxXxXxX..N is lips! omg i am damn so happy!den after about 1 hour return back lorz..me being scolded like sh!t arz for not telling my parents where i ran to..haix...but realli happy larz..tts all for today liao larz..ke lian de sian ma stay at home whole day..lol rot like siao!den si sian ger go national stadium larz..good lorz! like ah ma sae win liao larz..li lin keep playing mahjong!become a du gui siah!haha still win worzx..ya lar..today sian sian family all got jie mu baxz..but all sux de..onli wei yan! hahazx..but she veri ke lian..got a headache..she sae her head going to crack..den after eating ice cream jui hao le..hear tt their another member gen oso gone to national stadium too..best lar they 2..hao le larz..bu duo jiang le..care all~!

must copi sissy le..yao hui yi hui yi..still remember me sec 1 to sec 2 not so sian de..always play computer games to kill time..den oso quite nice to have bunch of gd frds larz..but also quarrel de larz..not as untied as sissy they all lorz..now sec 3 le..mature le bazx?lolzx..dun lyk play games anymore..always listen songs,chat in msn..will always feel sian de..oso dunno y..maybe tio sian sian de illness bazx..most interesting is like to hear about ppl problems den help them solve lorz..veri BHB hor?haizx..ok larz..now talk about me n her le..if i not worng de hua,me and her meet at 15 of januray this year..its fate lai de..we meet in restaurant..n we know each other through singing..den so on and so far lorz..hint hint..shld noe wad i mean bazx..being wif her is the happiest moment de..always listen to her difficulties..she oso veri hao de..always by my side to support me wadever i do...me and her always go out at weekend de lorz..cause she not same sch wif me...she arz... veri rich baxz..studying at private institution..month passes n our feelings for each other has deepen..i am so guiltity when i start to have feelings for someone in our class which is eureka larz..i tell her how i feel..Out of expectation she neber even angry wif me..she sae she give me time till i can forget her..i was so touched..promise her will onli luv her onli..maybe is i make the wrong decision to let her tell her parents den we being together..her parents disagree....n wanted her to go overseas to further her studies n change a new living environment..haizx..i was so depressed n shocked to hear tat..both of us was so sad n dun bear to leave each other..one day she suddenly li jia chu zo.. i was so worried and helpless..cant slp tt day..cant even contact her..den about 2 something her frd call me tt she is staying at her hse..tt made me feel much much better siah..i tok to her over e phone..she cry...i feel so hurt n tortured..dun wish to see her sad anymore..maybe i shld give up..maybe shld let her go..make her hate me n forget me. tt maybe is the best solution..but sissy ask me not to do tt so..haizx..so heed thier advice lorz...dunno when larz her parents gimme a mission to accomplish which is impossbile? dun think so?if i succeed she dun habe to go...tt will prove me can provide her long life happiness and yang ta yi bei zi...time is running out..date line is 18th of this month..hope me can make it bazx..haizx.. all can sae is chen nian wang shi le..but realli miss time wif her..still can remember so clearly..when celebrate her birthday tt day,after singing bday song den she eat the cake ma..eat until like a hua mao..so cute~~ n we oso lyk to sit close together talking about xin shi...the type of feeling nan yi yong zi lai xing rong..she is juz like a rainbow in my life brigtening me up everyday..den lyk to hear her sing arz..like chui mian qu..so nice..now she is not by my side...dunno wad to sae larz..feel like dying arz..haiz..

today is oso a sian sian day arz..nth to do at home..hai wo going to rot again..still need to go grandma hse and celebrate..so wu liao~! something funny happens! ah ma yesterday become sian ma! she have a new name le~! lolzx..today ah ma oso whole day rot at home..she as ke lian as me larz..sian ger is the best one..go national stadium and see parade..zhen xian mu wy..for li lin she go her aunt hse and celebrate lorz..eveyone has own jie mu but mine is the most sian One!! N today is the 6th day not having her by my side without any contact..Her tupid parents larz..all thei fault..hai wo miss her like siao..hope can as soon as possible to accomplish the mission baxz...yesterday soccer fun worzx.. thanks to sissy supoort we won!!score 3 to 1!!happy larz but me got injured arz..the stupid idiot clashed wif me hai wo leg twisted badly arz..but he is neither better..hehezx...
